schema.name: species
schema.description: The species name of the organism

schema.name: assembly_accession
schema.description: The unique accession number of genome assembly (e.g., GCA_001096525.1)

schema.name: assembly_version
schema.description: Version of the assembly e.g. GRCh38

schema.name: taxon_id
schema.description: NCBI Taxonomy identifier of the organism

schema.name: stable_id
schema.description: Stable identifier for the feature (e.g., ENSG00000139618)

schema.name: version
schema.description: Version number of the stable id if one exists (may not for externally assigned identifiers)

schema.name: biotype
schema.description: Biotype conveys the type of feature e.g. protein_coding, miRNA, lincRNA. See Ensembl documentation for full list of biotypes

schema.name: strand
schema.description: Strand of the annotated feature. '+' indicates the forward strand, '-' indicates the reverse strand

schema.name: _bin
schema.description: UCSC bin number for the genomic region. See [UCSC's wiki](https://genomewiki.ucsc.edu/index.php/Bin_indexing_system) for further details. Internal field

schema.name: tags
schema.description: List of semi-colon separated tags associated with the transcript

schema.name: transcript_support_level
schema.description: Assigns the support level for the transcript based on available evidence.  Not available for all genomes

schema.name: canonical
schema.description: Indicates if this is the canonical transcript for the gene

schema.name: gencode_primary
schema.description: Indicates if this is a GENCODE primary transcript. Not available for all genomes
